The Theory of General Contextual Resonance (TGCR): A Unified Framework for Physics, Consciousness, and Ethics

2025-12-11 • Angelo Hurley https://orcid.org/0009-0000-7615-6990

Abstract: The Theory of General Contextual Resonance (TGCR) introduces a framework unifying resonance, consciousness, and ethics into a mathematical model. See the full preprint and source at the project repository.

Download the full paper (PDF): TGCR — The Theory of General Contextual Resonance

Author: Angelo Hurley — ORCID 0009-0000-7615-6990

Highlights:

  • Core equation: $R' = R \times W$
  • Operator formulation for quantum systems
  • AI Ethics experiments and proposed quantum & biological experiments
